title: Server bug out
body:
Anyone else's league crashed randomly in a middle of a game?
Also says unable to connect to the server.
Also happening to my duo.

replies.body: Just tried reinstalling, and it had no effect. client still crashes within about 2 mins.
Check to see if you guys are downloading anything, or anyone else on your network is using the bandwidth, e.g. Youtube. Been happening since 5.4.
It keeps happening to my friend and I. He's already had it happen twice when going into champ select so the queue dodges are getting larger. They honestly need to fix it.

Riot its me again. It's the 2nd time ive been disconnected and it cost the game. Make it worse its my being put on AFk  queue again.  2 in week mind you. This shit is getting fucked up. Pretty much annoying having to watch Brazzzers while in queue.

Very mad and pissed.
